=================
gunshotmatch-cli
=================

.. start short_desc

**GunShotMatch Command-Line Interface.**

.. end short_desc

Installation
--------------

.. start installation

``gunshotmatch-cli`` can be installed from PyPI.

To install with ``pip``:

.. code-block:: bash

	$ python -m pip install gunshotmatch-cli

.. end installation
